title.rendered: Thank you for completing the survey!

content.rendered:
We appreciate all the input from you faithful Gottwals Books fans who have completed our survey.  We are having a busy summer, and your answers help keep things running smoothly at all Gottwals Books locations.

If you didn’t receive the survey, sign up for future mailings by clicking the e-mail signup on the left side of your screen.
